entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: butterbeer
entities.description: A magical drink that has an effect on Harry.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is hosting a party.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: A Gryffindor student and Quidditch player who is injured.

entities.name: gryffindor team
entities.description: The Quidditch team that Harry is training.

entities.name: transfiguration
entities.description: A subject that Dean and Harry are taking in school.

relationships.description: Harry is waiting to see how Butterbeer will affect him.
The party is being held in Slughorn's dimly lit room.
Katie Bell is currently at St Mungo's Hospital.
Harry is training the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
Katie Bell was a member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
The Gryffindor team is facing off against Slytherin in their opening match.
Harry corners Dean Thomas after class to discuss the Quidditch tryouts.
Katie Bell's injury means that the Gryffindor team needs a replacement Chaser.
